description: Detects the deletion of tomcat WebServer logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: During uninstallation of the tomcat server
name: Tomcat WebServer Logs Deleted
query: (file.path.text:"*\\Tomcat*" AND file.path.text:"*\\logs\\*" AND file.path.text:("*catalina.*" OR "*_access_log.*" OR "*localhost.*"))
